message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its worth, I'm initially offering it for $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This feels like a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll make a counteroffer of $9,750. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
